/* Comments fix */
/* GSheets */
div:not(.docs-ui-unprintable) .docos-anchoredreplyview-avatar-holder img {
    filter: invert(95%) !important;
}

textarea.docos-input-textarea {

    background-color: var(--bg-10);
}
